verbose_text: Intralipid emulsion therapy was administered in six human cases reported by Alhaya et al. Two of those patients had ingested LTG only, and administration of ILE rapidly narrowed the QRS complex and resolved the conduction delay.10 Chavez et al state that a potential role for ILE has been described in patients with toxic levels of LTG and ECG changes refractory to treatment with bicarbonate.
